item.title: AMD to acquire infrastructure player ZT Systems for $4.9B to amp up its AI ecosystem play

item.description:

item.title: Amazon considers moving Amazon Pay into a standalone app in India
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Amazon is considering shifting its payments offerings in India into a standalone app, three sources familiar with the matter told TechCrunch, as the e-commerce giant aims to boost usage of Amazon Pay in the country. Amazon Pay is currently housed within the company’s primary e-commerce app in India, and lets users transfer money to individuals […]

item.description:

She noted that other congresspeople from the Bay Area — Zoe Lofgren, Anna Eshoo, […]

item.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp is ‘not going to apologize’ for military work

item.description:

item.title: OpenAI’s new voice mode let me talk with my phone, not to it

item.description:
I’ve been playing around with OpenAI’s Advanced Voice Mode for the last week, and it’s the most convincing taste I’ve had of an AI-powered future yet. This week, my phone laughed at jokes, made them back to me, asked me how my day was, and told me it’s having “a great time.” I was talking […]

item.title: X says it’s closing operations in Brazil
item.dc:creator: Anthony Ha
item.description:
X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter, said today that it’s ending operations in Brazil, although the service will remain available to users in the country.
